00013 #ifndef NDIMENSIONAL_H

00016 #define __need_size_t
00017 #include <stddef.h>

00019 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00020 #include <string>
00021 #include "DataStorage/common.hpp"

00024 namespace isis

00031 
00032 template<unsigned short DIM> size_t __dimStride( const size_t dim[] )
00033 {
00034     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( DIM > 0 );//Make sure recursion terminates
00035     return __dimStride < DIM - 1 > ( dim ) * dim[DIM-1];
00036 }
00037 
00038 template<unsigned short DIM> size_t __dim2Index( const size_t d[], const size_t dim[] )
00039 {
00040     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( DIM > 0 );//Make sure recursion terminates
00041     return d[DIM] * __dimStride<DIM>( dim ) + __dim2Index < DIM - 1 > ( d, dim );
00042 }
00043 
00044 template<unsigned short DIM> bool __rangeCheck( const size_t d[], const size_t dim[] )
00045 {
00046     return ( d[DIM] < dim[DIM] ) && __rangeCheck < DIM - 1 > ( d, dim );
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<> inline size_t __dimStride<0>( const size_t dim[] ) {return 1;}
00050 template<> inline size_t __dim2Index<0>( const size_t d[], const size_t dim[] ) {return d[0] * __dimStride<0>( dim );}
00051 template<> inline bool   __rangeCheck<0>( const size_t d[], const size_t dim[] ) {return d[0] < dim[0];}
00052 
00054 
00056 template<unsigned short DIMS> class NDimensional
00057 {
00058     size_t dim[DIMS];
00059 protected:
00060     NDimensional() {}
00061 public:
00062     static const size_t n_dims = DIMS;
00068     void init( const size_t d[DIMS] ) {
00069         std::copy( d, d + DIMS, dim );
00070         LOG_IF( volume() == 0, Runtime, error ) << "Creating object with volume of 0";
00071     }
00072     void init( const util::FixedVector<size_t, DIMS>& d ) {
00073         d.copyTo( dim );
00074         LOG_IF( volume() == 0, Runtime, error ) << "Creating object with volume of 0";
00075     }
00076     NDimensional( const NDimensional &src ) {//@todo default copier should do the job
00077         init( src.dim );
00078     }
00083     size_t dim2Index( const size_t d[DIMS] )const {
00084         return __dim2Index < DIMS - 1 > ( d, dim );
00085     }
00091     bool rangeCheck( const size_t d[DIMS] )const {
00092         return __rangeCheck < DIMS - 1 > ( d, dim );
00093     }
00098     size_t volume()const {
00099         return __dimStride<DIMS>( dim );
00100     }
00102     size_t dimSize( size_t idx )const {
00103         return dim[idx];
00104     }
00105 
00107     std::string sizeToString( std::string delim = "x" )const {
00108         return util::list2string( dim, dim + DIMS, delim, "", "" );
00109     }
00110 
00112     util::FixedVector<size_t, DIMS> sizeToVector()const {
00113         return util::FixedVector<size_t, DIMS>( dim );
00114     }
00115 
00120     size_t relevantDims()const {
00121         size_t ret = 0;
00122 
00123         for ( unsigned short i = DIMS; i; i-- ) {
00124             if ( dim[i-1] > 1 ) {
00125                 ret = i;
00126                 break;
00127             }
00128         }
00129 
00130         return ret;
00131     }
00132     util::FixedVector<float, DIMS> getFoV( const util::FixedVector<float, DIMS> &voxelSize, const util::FixedVector<float, DIMS> &voxelGap )const {
00133         LOG_IF( volume() == 0, DataLog, warning ) << "Calculating FoV of empty data";
00134         const util::FixedVector<size_t, DIMS> voxels = sizeToVector();
00135         const util::fvector4 gapSize = voxelGap * ( voxels - 1 );
00136         return voxelSize * voxels + gapSize;
00137     }
00138 };
00139 
00140 }
00141 }
00142 }
